channel.title: Critters on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Critters on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Oldenburg Fest to Honor ‘Critters’ Star Don Keith Opper
item.description: The German independent festival will screen a retrospective of Opper’s work, including the first two ‘Critters’ movies as well as ‘Android’ and ‘Slam Dance.’
